name: A dark cloak shimmering with moonlight
data: It decreases the users constitution unnoticably.
It increases the users wisdom a good amount.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has negative armour class for its type (negative in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
